Row.Text: Hello. I am sure we can have a warm future ahead of us.
Greetings. Would you like some tea? A doll will be coming by with a fresh pot.
Hello. My dolls and I are pleased to meet you.
Alas, it is too late for me to complete the perfect doll.
Brute force will only get you so far without strategy and tactics.
I have failed. Medicine! It is time for you to raise your own banner!
Even the dolls are falling asleep.
I cannot possibly allow that.
We will not be able to accept.
Welcome.
Hi.
What is it?
Did you forget something last time?
Doing well?
Great, it is you again.
I still have more dolls. It will work.
I am tired of sewing together so many dolls. A break?
If you are going to try something, keep in mind that you are surrounded by hundreds of Hourai dolls.
I've been told your scientists are having a hard time with making dolls.
You will betray us? We will never forgive you.
How have you been with your projects?
It has been very stressful with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} lately.
Preparations for our war with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} are going along nicely. The dolls will be ready soon.
It's easy to see that your war will come to a drastic end.
Are your army supplies holding up?
You think you can outpace me? My dolls can be made faster than you can ever imagine.
Some dolls at our alert posts have been getting restless about your troop movements.
Be prepared to fight a losing battle, protecting your land from my forces.
You seem to be quite eager with the land-grabbing.
Even if you buy your land, you will not keep it for much longer.
Be careful of where you buy your land, or otherwise we might have to come and take it back.
Your forces are quite close to equaling ours.
Your trade routes have been doing well, I suppose?
You will never get anywhere with so few cities.
Your army is quite small. My dolls would have no trouble taking you over.
Your constant warmongering must be stopped. Seeing the number of your own men killed as a result of your wars makes me wonder what you would do to my dolls.
This is not worth my time.
You have more things to say about me?
Not only do we have to deal with {1_PlayerName}, we now also have you...
An ally and friend of {1_PlayerName} will always be welcomed.
You must not know the true aspects of {1_PlayerName}.
{1_PlayerName} must be wiped from this earth. Something we both agree on.
It is too soon, I cannot. Perhaps when I get a better judgement of your plans.
We should both team up and denounce {1_CivName}.
Would you go to war against {1_CivName} with me? With the two of us they will not stand a chance.
How rude, disrespecting my kindness.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You betrayed my trust, and the rest of the world must know to remove you as fast as possible.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
My dolls will always be much purer than you can ever be.
I am glad to see that you feel friendly with my allies.
You will regret siding with {1_CivName}.
So you were the disrespectful one they were talking about.
You have gotten the same feeling with them as my dolls have.
If you will work with {1_CivName} then you can also work with me.
If we work together against {1_CivName} they will soon fall.
You sided with {1_PlayerName}? My dolls will crush both of you.
I am happy to work with {1_CivName} if you dislike them so much.
([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]If you see this, comment back with what you did and this text code: [NEWLINE]TXT_KEY_LEADER_ALICE_ATTACKED_PROTECTED_CITY_STATE_1[ENDCOLOR])
You are growing too fast to not be regarded as a threat. Stop at once if you value your life.
Growing too quickly can lead to many enemies, especially if you settle near me.
It seems like we cannot deal with you through negotiations.
The dolls have been complaining of your rapid land-grabbing. We will not hesitate to walk over and take it back.
You can take all the land you want, but if my dolls find it necessary.
Even after giving your word you break it. My dolls will not take your lies lightly.
Oh, you were protecting them? I thought you just left them to fend for themselves.
My apologies about attacking your protected city-state. It was a mistake on my part.
Would you like to work with us?
Coop Terminated : WARMONGER
Coop Terminated : CITY-STATES
Coop Terminated : LAND-GRAB
Coop Terminated : WONDERS
Coop Terminated : VICTORY
Coop Terminated : FIN
The times you have been in the way of me and my dolls have been innumerable.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Your actions are a disgrace to the entire world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced you! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Hidden Pact end.
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has to go. Would you like the honors of destroying them with me?
It is time for war with {1_PlayerName:textkey}.
From now on, every doll you see... will be out to get you.
We will see you as the one who stands in our way. And we will not hesitate to remove you from our path.
I would have never thought that you were capable of doing that.
My dolls are strong in numbers but weak by themselves, and you still were able to defeat them. If I had perfected my dolls I would be winning by now.
You enjoy mauling entire civilizations to your benefit, something that I greatly loathe about your being.
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} needs my assistance more than they need yours.
That suits us.
The dolls are happy to hear that.
Yes, that will be great.
Thanks, I appreciate it.
We thank you for your assistance.
That is a shame.
That is too bad.
Fine.
So be it.
Many thanks for returning those dolls.
Some of my dolls were living there. I will not hesitate to bring them back by force.
What? How dare you.
A weak army leads to a weak nation... which leads to a dead civilization.
It is impossible to kill all my dolls with your nuclear weapons.
How weak of you to push around those weaker than you.
Even your people have turned against you.
Your civilization is but a tiny dot on the earth.
How can you achieve anything with so few people?
Your people have no personality, no culture.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
I refuse.
Fine, the dolls do not like living there anyways.
My dolls can settle wherever they want.
We will have no problems working with you.
No.
Absolutely not.

Let us have tea.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This should not appear. Something went wrong. If you want, you can send TXT_KEY_LEADER_ALICE_WORK_AGAINST_SOMEONE_YES to me and I will write up something for this.[ENDCOLOR])
I have no problems with you wanting them gone. We accept.
Please wait for 10 turns so that I can build some more dolls.
Fine. You can have it.
You are so weak. Why are you trying to threaten me?
I hate you. Why will I give it to you?
I cannot. I need to leave some for the dolls too.
I have already stated my answer before. No.
This sounds interesting.
We have had enough of this war.
You have some things that would greatly help my dolls.
I would like to have something of yours. The dolls will greatly appreciate it.
A trade for some convenience items?
We would like to have access to you lands.
I would like to move some forces across your territory.
We have been interested in sending over a few of our greatest doll minds to you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
I think you would be rather interested in what my dolls have come up with recently. We would be interested in your research too.
This is perfectly fine.
Well, it is not that bad. I accept.
I expected as much.
It depends on whether or not my dolls accept your apology too.
Never!
Are you trying to insult me?
This is fine as it is.
We would like to trade with you.
No amount of talk will convince me to take that deal.
You dare attack me? My dolls will overrun you.
Do not underestimate me.
Your little army is nothing compared to my forces.
Now is the time for us to show our true power.
Now we can show how strong we truly are by crushing you.
My dolls cannot wait to start with our assault.
We cannot coexist together, I am afraid. Prepared to be destroyed.
So, my dolls have not lied. You cannot be trusted.
It is time for your weak civilization to be wiped clean from this earth.
Expected from somebody who does not support the Front.
My dolls will like to take some of your land now.
The world will know the true wrath of the Doll Front!
An opening has appeared in your forces. This is the perfect time to deal a crippling blow to you.
You need to go before all else.
You think I care about anyone other than my dolls?
Tactically, a backstab is more effective than an upfront swing.
You were not interfering with us, but you still must go.
My dolls have overruled your statement. We will come over and take what we want by force.
What do you have to offer?
This will work.
My dolls will give no mercy.
Scared? Just more incentive to continue with the occupation.
You will not get away with that.
Note that we will still keep an eye on you.
We will do what we want.
Good.
Do not make an enemy of me.
Good.
You will not get away with this.
Excellent.
Try as you might, you cannot stop us.
We thought as much.
In the future we expect not to interfere with you.
Good.
So you will kneel to our superiority?
You should try better sending one of your agents into a civilization consisting of only dolls.
Your spy attempted to break into my house. Shanghai and Hourai dealt with them accordingly.
My dolls have been reporting someone suspicious roaming the streets lately.
Hmm, that disguise wasn't as effective as I hoped.
My apologies, I did not expect some dolls to run over to your cities.
I am fine with that.
Your words mean nothing to me.
I will extract them at once. They needed repairs and improvements to their forms anyways.
No, my dolls will do as they wish.
We are grateful for this information.
{1_PlayerName} is plotting behind your back.
{1_PlayerName} is plotting to attack {2_CityName}.
{1_PlayerName} is plotting to attack you.
{1_PlayerName} is plotting to attack {2_CityName} with their navy.
{1_PlayerName} is plotting to attack you with their navy.
That is a shame.
We will not spy again in the future.
The dolls need none of your blasphemy.
Good.
You still seek to win the faith of my dolls. They obey only me.
I don't have anything useless to give for that.
I'm sure my religion bonuses would benefit you in some way, but if you wish.
My religion is better and your people will follow it.
